verses.text: \w Of|strong="H1121"\w* understanding, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Ethan \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ezrahite|strong="H0250"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w for|strong="H3117"\w* ever. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shew forth thy truth \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mouth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* generation \w and|strong="H3068"\w* generation.

\w For|strong="H8605"\w* thou hast said: Mercy \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H0241"\w* built \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H8605"\w* ever \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens: thy truth \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H0241"\w* prepared \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* made \w a|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* elect: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* sworn \w to|strong="H5315"\w* David \w my|strong="H3588"\w* servant:

Thy seed \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0369"\w* settle \w for|strong="H2803"\w* ever. \w And|strong="H3381"\w* \w I|strong="H0369"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* build \w up|strong="H1961"\w* thy throne unto generation \w and|strong="H3381"\w* generation.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* heavens \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w confess|strong="H2142"\w* thy wonders, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy truth \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* church \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* saints.
For who in \w the|strong="H7896"\w* clouds can be compared to \w the|strong="H7896"\w* Lord: or who among \w the|strong="H7896"\w* sons \w of|strong="H8482"\w* God shall be like to God?

God, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* glorified \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* saints: great \w and|strong="H3605"\w* terrible \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* are \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

O Lord \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* hosts, \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* thee? thou art mighty, O Lord, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* thy truth \w is|strong="H3808"\w* round \w about|strong="H4480"\w* thee.

Thou rulest \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w power|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* appeasest \w the|strong="H3605"\w* motion \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* waves thereof.

Thou hast humbled \w the|strong="H0518"\w* proud \w one|strong="H0518"\w*, \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w one|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H6965"\w* \w is|strong="H4191"\w* slain: \w with|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* arm \w of|strong="H4191"\w* thy strength thou hast scattered thy \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*.

Thine \w are|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H6913"\w* thine \w is|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* earth: \w the|strong="H5608"\w* world \w and|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* fulness thereof thou hast founded:

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* north \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* sea thou hast created. Thabor \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Hermon \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy name:
Thy arm \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w*. Let thy hand \w be|strong="H3068"\w* strengthened, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy right hand exalted:

Justice \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* preparation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy throne. \w Mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* truth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* go \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*:

Blessed \w is|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* people that knoweth jubilation. \w They|strong="H5375"\w* \w shall|strong="H0589"\w* walk, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* Lord, \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w light|strong="H5375"\w* \w of|strong="H5375"\w* thy countenance:

\w And|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy name \w they|strong="H5921"\w* shall rejoice all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day, \w and|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy justice \w they|strong="H5921"\w* shall be exalted.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thou art \w the|strong="H3605"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* strength: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy good pleasure \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* horn \w be|strong="H3117"\w* exalted.

\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* protection is \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* king \w the|strong="H4480"\w* holy \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Israel.
Then thou spokest in a vision to thy saints, and saidst: I have laid help upon one that is mighty, and have exalted one chosen out of my people.
I have found David my servant: with my holy oil I have anointed him.
For my hand shall help him: and my arm shall strengthen him.
The enemy shall have no advantage over him: nor the son of iniquity have power to hurt him.
And I will cut down his enemies before his face; and them that hate him I will put to flight.
And my truth and my mercy shall be with him: and in my name shall his horn be exalted.
And I will set his hand in the sea; and his right hand in the rivers.
He shall cry out to me: Thou art my father: my God, and the support of my salvation.
And I will make him my firstborn, high above the kings of the earth.
I will keep my mercy for him for ever: and my covenant faithful to him.
And I will make his seed to endure for evermore: and his throne as the days of heaven.
And if his children forsake my law, and walk not in my judgments:
If they profane my justices: and keep not my commandments:
I will visit their iniquities with a rod: and their sins with stripes.
But my mercy I will not take away from him: nor will I suffer my truth to fail.
Neither will I profane my covenant: and the words that proceed from my mouth I will not make void.
Once have I sworn by my holiness: I will not lie unto David:
His seed shall endure for ever.
And his throne as the sun before me: and as the moon perfect for ever, and a faithful witness in heaven.
But thou hast rejected and despised: thou hast been angry with thy anointed.
Thou hast overthrown the covenant of thy servant: thou hast profaned his sanctuary on the earth.
Thou hast broken down all his hedges: thou hast made his strength fear.
All that pass by the way have robbed him: he is become a reproach to his neighbours.
Thou hast set up the right hand of them that oppress him: thou hast made all his enemies to rejoice.
Thou hast turned away the help of his sword; and hast not assisted him in battle.
Thou hast made his purification to cease: and thou hast cast his throne down to the ground.
Thou hast shortened the days of his time: thou hast covered him with confusion.
How long, O Lord, turnest thou away unto the end? shall thy anger burn like fire?
Remember what my substance is for hast thou made all the children of men in vain?
Who is the man that shall live, and not see death: that shall deliver his soul from the hand of hell?
Lord, where are thy ancient mercies, according to what thou didst swear to David in thy truth?
Be mindful, O Lord, of the reproach of thy servants (which I have held in my bosom) of many nations:
Wherewith thy enemies have reproached, O Lord; wherewith they have reproached the change of thy anointed.
Blessed be the Lord for evermore. So be it. So be it.
